definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Theory, Aural, Technique, Song Writting, Improvisation Ideas.
sentences.chinese: 樂理，聽力，技術，作曲，即興。

sentences.english: I'm not very good at Japanese music.
sentences.chinese: 我對日本樂理不太內行。

sentences.english: I went for my AMusTCL exam today.
I can teach whole skills and principles of acoustic and electric guitar.
sentences.chinese: 本人亦能任教木結他和電結他的技巧及樂理。

sentences.english: I do not know the music theory, so I can not say what is the chord .
sentences.chinese: 我不懂樂理知識，所以我說不出什麼是和音。

definition: part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
lit. ripe as a melon that rolls from its vine (idiom); fig. to know fluently/to know sth inside out/to know sth by heart
to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
ukulele/simplified form also written 尤克里里琴
